meanings.definition: Kept clean and tidy as a house.
meanings.sent1: The housekept room was spotless and organized.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a housekept living space to feel comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The housekept kitchen made cooking a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her housekept garden bloomed with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The housekept bedroom had a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: She housekept the property by fixing any issues promptly.
meanings.sent2: He housekept the vacation home while the owners were away.
meanings.sent3: The cat housekept the mouse out of the house.
meanings.sent4: They housekept the old mansion with great care.
meanings.sent5: The family housekept their home together as a team.
